short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple programmer assistant,providing time conversion, BASE64, MD5 encryption and other functions.
short.zh_CN: 一个简单的程序员小助手,提供时间转换、base64、MD5加密等功能。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: During the development process, I often encounter similar small requests for parsing timestamps or generating an MD5. Every time I need to search online tools through search engines, I am very troublesome. I hope this gadget can help.
long.zh_CN: 开发过程中，经常会碰到类似解析时间戳或者生成一个MD5的小需求，每次都需要通过搜索引擎搜索在线工具十分麻烦，希望这个小工具能帮上忙
